description: This file contains environment variables that are used during development and tests.

development.SYNAPSE_USERNAME: ...set to a Synapse username that is suitable for testing...
development.SYNAPSE_ENCRYPTED_STORAGE_LOCATION_ID: ...set to a storage location id that is suitable for testing...
development.LOGIN_WHITELIST: ...set to comma separated list of emails that can access the app...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_LOG_FOLDER_ID: ...set to the Synapse folder ID where logs will be stored...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_TEAM_MANAGER_US: ...set to comma separated list of user IDs to add to the project team as managers...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_GRANT_PROJECT_A: ...set to comma separated list of principal IDs and permission code (123:ADMIN,124:CAN_EDIT)...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_GRANT_TEAM_ENTI: ...set to comma separated list of synapse IDs and permission code (syn123:ADMIN,syn124:CAN_EDIT)...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_FOLDER_NAMES: ...set to comma separated list of folder names...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_WIKI_PROJECT_ID: ...set to the Synapse project ID to copy the wiki from...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_CONTRIBUTION_AG: ...set to the Synapse table ID to update contribution agreement data...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_ADDITIONAL_PART: ...set to DCA institution additional parties JSON config...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_CONTRIBUTOR_TRA: ...set to the Synapse file view ID for tracking all project files...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DAA_GRANT_ACCESS_ADDITIONA: ...set to DAA institution additional parties JSON config...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DAA_GRANT_ACCESS_AGREEMENT: ...set to the Synapse table ID to update access agreement data...
development.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DAA_GRANT_ACCESS_TEAM_MANA: ...set to comma separated list of user IDs to add to the team as managers...

test.SYNAPSE_USERNAME: ...set to a Synapse username that is suitable for testing...
test.SYNAPSE_ENCRYPTED_STORAGE_LOCATION_ID: ...set to a storage location id that is suitable for testing...
test.TEST_OTHER_SYNAPSE_USER_ID: ...set to a Synapse user ID that is not the same as SYNAPSE_USERNAME...
test.TEST_EMAIL: ...set to a real email address that supports + syntax (john+test@something.com)...
